text: أَوْ يَأْخُذَهُمْ فِى تَقَلُّبِهِمْ فَمَا هُم بِمُعْجِزِينَ

translation.en.sahih: Or that He would not seize them during their [usual] activity, and they could not cause failure?
translation.id.indonesian: atau Allah mengazab mereka diwaktu mereka dalam perjalanan, maka sekali-kali mereka tidak dapat menolak (azab itu),
